https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/58f3d0986d742e56725fae92400799eada1847e5/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/laghos/package.py#L35

When installing 'ecp-proxy-apps' Laghos will fail to build unless the version of 'mfem' is manually limited to '4.1.0'.  The build step for Laghos will fail with mfem@4.2.0

GCC Version = 9.3.0
OpenMPI Version = 3.6.1
title: Laghos@3.0 fails to build with mfem@4.2.0
